effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.legends_za: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.legends_za: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.
